enabled.name: Show distance on hover
enabled.hint: Whether to so the token the distance between the selected token and the hovered one.

forceEuclidean.name: Always use euclidean distance
forceEuclidean.hint: Use euclidean distance even when the game system offers a way to calculate the distance (a.k.a same distance as ruler). Otherwise euclidean distance will only be used when no other method is available.
